chest.title: Bench Press
chest.description: A classic compound exercise to build chest, shoulders, and triceps strength.
steps: Lie flat on the bench with feet firmly planted on the ground.
Grip the bar slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Lower the bar to your chest.
Press it back up until arms are fully extended.

chest.title: Incline Dumbbell Press
chest.description: Targets the upper part of the chest.
steps: Set an incline bench at 30-45 degrees.
Hold dumbbells at shoulder height.
Press the weights up until arms are extended.
Lower slowly to the starting position.

chest.title: Chest Fly
steps: Lie on a flat bench with dumbbells in hand.
Open your arms wide, feeling the stretch in your chest.
Bring the weights back together above your chest.

chest.title: Push-Ups
chest.description: A bodyweight exercise targeting chest and triceps.
steps: Start in a high plank position.
Lower your body down, bending elbows.
Push yourself back up.

chest.title: Decline Bench Press
steps: Set the bench to a decline position.
Lower the bar to the lower chest.
Press it back up to full arm extension.

chest.title: Cable Chest Fly
chest.description: Isolates the chest using cable machines.
steps: Stand between the cables, arms extended.
Bring the handles together in front of you.
Slowly return to the starting position.

chest.title: Chest Dips
steps: Grasp the dip bars with arms extended.
Lower your body by bending elbows.
Push back up to starting position.

chest.title: Pec Deck Machine
steps: Sit on the pec deck machine.
Bring the handles together in front of you.
Return to the starting position.

chest.title: Incline Cable Fly
chest.description: Works the upper chest using cables.
steps: Set the bench to a 45-degree incline.
Grip the cables and bring them together in front of you.
Return to the starting position with control.

chest.title: Machine Chest Press
chest.description: A machine-based chest press for controlled movement.
steps: Sit on the machine with handles at chest level.
Press the handles forward until your arms are fully extended.
Slowly return to the starting position.

back.title: Pull-Ups
back.description: A bodyweight exercise focusing on the upper back.
steps: Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip.
Pull your body up until your chin is over the bar.
Lower yourself back down with control.

back.title: Deadlift
back.description: A compound movement that targets the entire back.
steps: Stand with feet hip-width apart and grip the barbell with hands just outside your knees.
Lift the barbell by extending your hips and knees.
Lower the bar back to the floor with control.

back.title: Bent-Over Row
steps: Hold a barbell or dumbbells with palms facing down.
Hinge at the hips and lower your torso.
Pull the weight towards your lower chest.
Lower the weight back to the starting position.

back.title: Lat Pulldown
back.description: A cable machine exercise that isolates the lats.
steps: Sit on the lat pulldown machine and grip the bar with an overhand grip.
Pull the bar down to your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades.
Slowly return the bar to the starting position.

back.title: T-Bar Row
back.description: A row variation that targets the mid-back.
steps: Stand over a barbell with a V-handle attachment.
Hinge at the hips and pull the bar towards your chest.
Lower the bar back down with control.

back.title: One-Arm Dumbbell Row
back.description: Isolates each side of the back.
steps: Place one hand on a bench and hold a dumbbell in the other.
Pull the dumbbell towards your waist while keeping your back straight.
Lower the dumbbell back down slowly.

back.title: Seated Cable Row
back.description: Targets the mid-back and lats using cables.
steps: Sit at a cable row machine with feet on the platform.
Pull the handle towards your torso while keeping your back straight.
Extend your arms back to the starting position.

back.title: Chest-Supported Row
back.description: Reduces strain on the lower back by supporting the chest.
steps: Lie face down on an incline bench while holding dumbbells.
Pull the dumbbells towards your chest.
Lower them back down with control.

back.title: Good Morning
back.description: Strengthens the lower back, hamstrings, and glutes.
steps: Stand with a barbell across your shoulders.
Hinge at the hips, lowering your torso forward while keeping your back straight.
Return to the starting position by extending your hips.

back.title: Inverted Row
back.description: Bodyweight exercise for the mid-back and lats.
steps: Lie under a bar or Smith machine and grab the bar with an overhand grip.
Pull your chest towards the bar while keeping your body straight.
Lower yourself back down with control.

biceps.title: Bicep Curl
biceps.description: A fundamental exercise for arm development.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart holding dumbbells.
Curl the weights towards your shoulders.
Lower the weights slowly.

biceps.title: Hammer Curl
steps: Hold dumbbells at your sides with palms facing inward.
Lift the weights until your forearms are vertical.
Lower them slowly back down.

biceps.title: Preacher Curl
biceps.description: Isolation exercise for the lower biceps.
steps: Sit on a preacher bench with arms extended on the pad.
Curl the barbell or dumbbells towards you.
Lower the weight back down with control.

biceps.title: Concentration Curl
biceps.description: Isolates each bicep individually for maximum contraction.
steps: Sit on a bench with a dumbbell in one hand.
Rest your elbow on the inside of your thigh.
Curl the dumbbell towards your shoulder.

biceps.title: EZ Bar Curl
biceps.description: Uses an EZ curl bar to target the biceps with a comfortable grip.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Grip the EZ bar with both hands.
Curl the bar towards your shoulders, then lower it.

biceps.title: Cable Curl
biceps.description: Keeps constant tension on the biceps with a cable machine.
steps: Stand with a cable handle in each hand.
Curl the cables towards your shoulders.
Slowly lower the handles back down.

biceps.title: Reverse Curl
biceps.description: Targets the brachialis muscle under the biceps.
steps: Stand with a barbell or EZ curl bar.
Grip the bar with palms facing down.
Curl the bar towards your shoulders.

biceps.title: Incline Dumbbell Curl
biceps.description: Targets the long head of the biceps.
steps: Sit on an incline bench with dumbbells in hand.
Curl the weights towards your shoulders.
Lower them slowly back down.

biceps.title: Zottman Curl
biceps.description: Works both biceps and forearms with rotation.
steps: Start with a standard curl.
At the top, rotate your palms downwards.
Lower the weights with palms facing down.

biceps.title: 21s Curl
biceps.description: A three-phase bicep curl workout for intense pump.
steps: Perform 7 half reps from the bottom to halfway.
Perform 7 half reps from halfway to the top.
Perform 7 full reps from bottom to top.

triceps.title: Triceps Dips
triceps.description: A bodyweight exercise that targets the triceps.
steps: Sit on the edge of a bench with hands next to your hips.
Slide off the bench, keeping your legs straight.
Lower your body by bending your elbows.
Push back up to the starting position.

triceps.title: Close-Grip Bench Press
triceps.description: A barbell exercise that focuses on the triceps.
steps: Lie flat on the bench with your hands close together on the bar.
Lower the bar to your chest.
Press the bar up, extending your arms fully.

triceps.title: Overhead Triceps Extension
triceps.description: Targets the long head of the triceps.
steps: Hold a dumbbell with both hands overhead.
Bend your elbows to lower the dumbbell behind your head.
Extend your arms to return to the starting position.

triceps.title: Triceps Kickback
triceps.description: Isolates the triceps for full contraction.
steps: Hold a dumbbell in one hand and hinge at the hips.
Keep your elbow close to your side.
Extend your arm behind you.
Return to the starting position.

triceps.title: Skull Crushers
triceps.description: Lying triceps extension targeting all three heads of the triceps.
steps: Lie on a flat bench holding an EZ curl bar.
Lower the bar towards your forehead.
Extend your arms back to the starting position.

triceps.title: Rope Triceps Pushdown
triceps.description: Cable machine exercise focusing on triceps.
steps: Stand in front of a cable machine with the rope attachment.
Pull the rope down by extending your arms.
Return to the starting position with control.

triceps.title: Diamond Push-Ups
triceps.description: Bodyweight exercise for triceps using a narrow hand position.
steps: Start in a push-up position with hands close together, forming a diamond shape.
Lower your body down while keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Push yourself back up to the starting position.

triceps.title: Triceps Press Machine
triceps.description: Machine exercise for controlled triceps work.
steps: Sit on the machine with handles at shoulder height.
Press the handles down by extending your arms.
Return to the starting position.

triceps.title: Dumbbell Floor Press
triceps.description: Targets the triceps with minimal shoulder involvement.
steps: Lie on the floor with dumbbells in hand.
Press the dumbbells up until your arms are fully extended.
Lower them to the floor, stopping when your upper arms touch the ground.

triceps.title: Cable Overhead Triceps Extension
triceps.description: Uses cables to target the long head of the triceps.
steps: Stand with your back to the cable machine, gripping the rope attachment.
Extend your arms overhead, pulling the rope up.
Lower it back down with control.

shoulders.title: Overhead Press
shoulders.description: A compound movement that targets the entire shoulder.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell at shoulder height.
Press the bar overhead by extending your arms.
Lower it back to the starting position.

shoulders.title: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
shoulders.description: A variation of the overhead press using dumbbells.
steps: Sit on a bench with dumbbells at shoulder height.
Press the dumbbells overhead by extending your arms.
Lower them back to the starting position.

shoulders.title: Lateral Raise
steps: Stand with a dumbbell in each hand.
Raise your arms out to the sides until they reach shoulder height.
Lower the dumbbells back down slowly.

shoulders.title: Front Raise
steps: Stand with a dumbbell in each hand.
Raise your arms in front of you until they reach shoulder height.
Lower them back down slowly.

shoulders.title: Arnold Press
shoulders.description: A shoulder press variation named after Arnold Schwarzenegger.
steps: Sit on a bench with dumbbells held in front of your chest.
Rotate your wrists as you press the dumbbells overhead.
Lower them back to the starting position.

shoulders.title: Face Pull
shoulders.description: A cable exercise that targets the rear delts and traps.
steps: Stand facing a cable machine with a rope attachment at eye level.
Pull the rope towards your face while keeping your elbows high.
Slowly return to the starting position.

shoulders.title: Shrugs
steps: Hold a dumbbell in each hand.
Shrug your shoulders towards your ears.
Lower your shoulders back down.

shoulders.title: Push Press
shoulders.description: A power move that combines a squat and overhead press.
steps: Hold a barbell at shoulder height.
Dip your knees slightly and explosively press the bar overhead.
Lower it back to the starting position.

shoulders.title: Reverse Fly
shoulders.description: Targets the rear delts and upper back.
steps: Sit on a bench holding dumbbells in each hand.
With a slight bend in your elbows, raise your arms out to the sides.
Lower the dumbbells back down slowly.

shoulders.title: Cable Lateral Raise
shoulders.description: Isolates the lateral delts with constant tension from the cable.
steps: Stand next to a cable machine with the handle set to the lowest position.
Raise your arm out to the side until it reaches shoulder height.
Lower your arm back down with control.

abs.title: Plank
abs.description: A core-strengthening exercise that works the abs and lower back.
steps: Start in a forearm plank position with your body straight.
Hold the position for as long as possible while keeping your core tight.

abs.title: Crunch
abs.description: A basic abdominal exercise targeting the upper abs.
steps: Lie on your back with knees bent and hands behind your head.
Lift your upper back off the ground, contracting your abs.
Lower back down with control.

abs.title: Bicycle Crunch
abs.description: Targets the abs and obliques by incorporating a twisting motion.
steps: Lie on your back with hands behind your head and legs lifted.
Bring one knee towards your chest while twisting your torso to touch it with the opposite elbow.
Alternate sides in a pedaling motion.

abs.title: Leg Raise
abs.description: Targets the lower abs by raising the legs.
steps: Lie on your back with your hands under your hips.
Lift your legs towards the ceiling while keeping them straight.
Lower your legs back down without letting them touch the ground.

abs.title: Russian Twist
abs.description: A rotational exercise targeting the obliques and core.
steps: Sit on the ground with your legs bent and lean back slightly.
Hold a weight or medicine ball and twist your torso from side to side.
Keep your core engaged throughout the movement.

abs.title: Mountain Climbers
abs.description: A dynamic movement that works the abs and elevates heart rate.
steps: Start in a high plank position.
Drive one knee towards your chest, then quickly switch legs in a running motion.
Continue alternating legs while keeping your core tight.

abs.title: Hanging Leg Raise
abs.description: A challenging exercise targeting the lower abs.
steps: Hang from a pull-up bar with your legs straight.
Raise your legs up towards your chest, keeping them straight.
Lower them back down with control.

abs.title: Ab Wheel Rollout
abs.description: An advanced core exercise using an ab wheel.
steps: Kneel on the ground and hold the ab wheel in front of you.
Roll the wheel forward, extending your body.
Pull the wheel back towards your knees to return to the starting position.

abs.title: Toe Touches
abs.description: Isolates the upper abs by reaching towards your toes.
steps: Lie on your back with legs extended upwards.
Reach your hands towards your toes, lifting your upper back off the ground.
Lower back down with control.

abs.title: Side Plank
abs.description: A variation of the plank that targets the obliques.
steps: Lie on your side and lift your body off the ground, supporting yourself on one forearm.
Hold the position for as long as possible while keeping your body straight.
Switch sides to work both obliques.

legs.title: Squats
legs.description: A fundamental leg exercise working the quads, glutes, and hamstrings.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Lower your body by bending at the knees and hips.
Push through your heels to stand back up.

legs.title: Lunges
legs.description: A unilateral exercise focusing on the quads and glutes.
steps: Step forward with one leg and lower your hips until both knees are bent at 90 degrees.
Push through the front heel to return to the starting position.
Repeat on the other leg.

legs.title: Leg Press
legs.description: Machine-based leg exercise for targeting quads and glutes.
steps: Sit on the leg press machine with feet shoulder-width apart on the platform.
Press the platform up until your legs are fully extended.
Lower it back down with control.

legs.title: Romanian Deadlift
steps: Hold a barbell or dumbbells in front of your thighs.
Hinge at the hips to lower the weight while keeping your back flat.
Push through your heels to stand back up.

legs.title: Bulgarian Split Squat
legs.description: Unilateral exercise targeting the quads and glutes.
steps: Place one foot behind you on a bench.
Lower your body by bending your front knee.
Push through your front heel to return to the starting position.

legs.title: Leg Curl
steps: Lie face down on the leg curl machine.
Curl the pad towards your glutes by bending your knees.
Lower the pad back down with control.

legs.title: Leg Extension
steps: Sit on the leg extension machine with your feet under the pad.
Extend your legs fully by lifting the pad.
Lower it back down slowly.

legs.title: Calf Raises
steps: Stand with your feet hip-width apart.
Raise your heels as high as possible.
Lower your heels back down.

legs.title: Sumo Deadlift
legs.description: Targets the glutes, hamstrings, and quads with a wide stance.
steps: Stand with feet wide and toes pointing out.
Grip the bar inside your knees.
Lift the bar by extending your hips and knees.

legs.title: Step-Ups
legs.description: A unilateral exercise for quads and glutes.
steps: Step onto a bench or platform with one foot.
Push through your front heel to stand up fully.
Lower yourself back down and repeat with the other leg.

helper_muscles.title: Forearm Curls
helper_muscles.description: Strengthens the forearm muscles and improves grip.
steps: Hold a barbell or dumbbells with an underhand grip.
Curl your wrists upwards towards your forearms.
Lower the weight back down with control.

helper_muscles.title: Farmer's Walk
helper_muscles.description: Improves grip strength and works the forearms, shoulders, and core.
steps: Hold a heavy dumbbell in each hand.
Walk forward while maintaining a tight grip and straight posture.

helper_muscles.title: Calf Raises
steps: Stand on the edge of a platform with your heels hanging off.
Raise your heels as high as possible.
Lower your heels back down with control.

helper_muscles.title: Towel Pull-Ups
helper_muscles.description: A variation of pull-ups that targets grip strength and forearms.
steps: Drape a towel over a pull-up bar and grip each end.
Perform a pull-up while maintaining a strong grip on the towel.

helper_muscles.title: Standing Calf Raise Machine
helper_muscles.description: Strengthens the calf muscles using a machine.
steps: Position yourself under the pads of a standing calf raise machine.
Raise your heels as high as possible, then lower them back down.

helper_muscles.title: Reverse Wrist Curls
steps: Hold a barbell with an overhand grip.
Curl your wrists upwards towards your forearms.
Lower the barbell back down with control.

helper_muscles.title: Seated Calf Raise
helper_muscles.description: Isolates the calf muscles while seated.
steps: Sit at a seated calf raise machine with the pads resting on your thighs.
Raise your heels as high as possible.
Lower your heels back down with control.

helper_muscles.title: Plate Pinch
helper_muscles.description: Improves grip strength by pinching weight plates.
steps: Hold two weight plates together between your fingers and thumb.
Hold them for as long as possible before releasing.

helper_muscles.title: Smith Machine Calf Raise
helper_muscles.description: Targets the calf muscles using a Smith machine.
steps: Position yourself under the bar of the Smith machine with the balls of your feet on a platform.
Raise your heels as high as possible, then lower them back down.

helper_muscles.title: Tennis Ball Squeeze
helper_muscles.description: Improves grip strength by squeezing a tennis ball.
steps: Hold a tennis ball in one hand.
Squeeze the ball as hard as possible, then release.
Repeat for reps or time.
